entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers later this afternoon. Snow level 1100 metres. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level near valley bottom. High 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
